body_text.text: This patent listing has been selected from a number of databases and is arranged alphabetically.
The information in square brackets following a selected patent, e.g. [Cotton P1 °] refers to the selecting author and its number in the annotated patents of the corresponding review.
body_text.section: • Patents considered by the reviewers to be of special interest. • • Patents considered by the reviewers to be of outstanding interest.
